name: Computer-graphics
tagline: CS 675 codes for assignments and projects
body:
### Assignment 1
We have implemented 

* loading points
* saving points
* adding points
* removing points
* making polygons(assuming triangle fan structure)
* making modelling and inspection modes
* used multiple VBO's

All the shortcuts that have been used are the same as specified in the assignment.
![Model 1 snapshot](http://i.imgur.com/50ZLvKk.png)
![Model 2 snapshot](http://i.imgur.com/r5Yy4cb.png)
![Model 3 snapshot](http://i.imgur.com/PI9gwaS.png)

We have used the same structure as array-buffer structure as in the examples since there was no need to change that.

### Authors and Contributors
Project by @ashray , roll number 11D070002 and @AkshatKadam, roll number 111030006.

Credit - Help was taken from a friend to help debug the malloc implementation, everything else is self written code.

Thanks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
